item.title: Let's Code AES! (AES in ECB Mode)
item.description: As an exercise, we code AES in ECB mode from scratch in JavaScript, and we use the results to solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 7.

item.title: Let's Detect AES! (AES in ECB Mode)
item.description: We learn how to detect AES encryption when used in its less-secure form, ECB mode. In the process, we solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 8.

item.title: Break Repeating-Key XOR
item.description: How is repeating-key XOR is vulnerable to attack. Find out by Solving Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 6.

item.title: Implement Repeating-Key XOR
item.description: Implement Repeating-key XOR, a slightly more secure version of the single-byte XOR cipher, and solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 5.

item.title: Detecting The Single-Byte XOR Cipher
item.description: Find the secret text encrypted using a single-byte XOR cipher and solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 3.

item.title: Cracking the Single-Byte XOR Cipher
item.description: Find the secret text encrypted using a single-byte XOR cipher and solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 3.

item.title: Calculating Fixed XOR
item.description: Calculate a Fixed XOR between two strings and solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 2.

item.title: Convert Hexadecimal String to Base-64
item.description: Calculate a Fixed XOR between two strings and solve Cryptopals Set 1 Challenge 1.
